name: Romeo Anthonia
description: I’m a down to earth, easy going, loving, caring, loyal, family oriented man, am a widower been widowed for 4 yrs now. I have just only 1 lovely son (John)(18 years old). After the sudden and devastating death of my wife, Who was a wonderful, sweet and caring wife and mother..Have been single for the past 4 years, am a man with a strong heart, loving, caring, honest, compassionate, affectionate, i believe in God. I like swimming, camping, fishing, reading & writing, tennis, Football, Basketball, Baseball, golf.
